heading: HB04753
0: AN ACT CONVERTING THE SUBSIDY THE EMERGENCY CALAMITY LOANS EXTENDED BY THE NATIONAL ELECTRIFICATION ADMINISTRATION TO THOSE AFFECTED BY TYPHOON LAWIN THAT WAS USED FOR THE RECONSTRUCTION, REPAIR AND REHABILITATION OF DISTRIBUTION LINES/SYSTEM AND OTHER INFRASTRUCTURE SUPPORT OF ELECTRIC COOPERATIVES AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS FOR THE PURPOSE
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04753
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CONVERTING THE SUBSIDY THE EMERGENCY CALAMITY LOANS EXTENDED BY THE NATIONAL ELECTRIFICATION ADMINISTRATION TO THOSE AFFECTED BY TYPHOON LAWIN THAT WAS USED FOR THE RECONSTRUCTION, REPAIR AND REHABILITATION OF DISTRIBUTION LINES/SYSTEM AND OTHER INFRASTRUCTURE SUPPORT OF ELECTRIC COOPERATIVES AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS FOR THE PURPOSE
